scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build-all: for i in js css static misc; do npm run build-$i || return; done
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-all
scripts.rebuild: npm run get && cp -f dist/package-lock.json . && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.check: npm run rebuild && cd dist && git status && [ ! "$(git status -z)" ]
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass style/index.scss -wo dist
scripts.watch: npm run watch-static && npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.serve: npm run watch & cd dist && live-server
scripts.commit-all: [ "$version" ] && npm run commit-dist && npm run commit-main
scripts.tag-all: [ "$version" -a "$message" ] && npm run tag-dist && npm run tag-main
scripts.tag-release: export version message="Release $version" && npm run tag-all
scripts.push-release: cd dist && git push && git push --tags && cd .. && git push && git push --tags
scripts.make-release: npm update && npm run build && npm run commit-release
scripts.publish-release: npm run check && npm run tag-release && npm run push-release
